title: Looking For AD Carry To Duo with!

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hey!

I'm a silver support main and am looking for an AD Main to duo with and climb with! 
My mains include:
Janna
Nami
Morgana
Thresh
Leona
plus some flex pics. (eg. Shen, Lulu.)
I can play aggressive or passive, doesn't bother me. I know when to roam, when to freeze etc. :)

replies.body: Hello! Funny, I've been trying to look for a support to duo with ever since i got out of bronze, currently silver 3, can play any adc (pref. {{champion:236}}  {{champion:429}} and would love to help each other out to get to gold or above! It'd be great to hear from you :D

hye, i'd be keen to duo with you. I can play any adc champ, and am quite eager to climb, as i've been stuck in elo hell for a long time now. i have Curse chat, skype and TS3. hope to hear from you so that the climb can be easier together. :)
